headline: Here’s Why Expedia Group (EXPE) Surged in Q3
summary: Chartwell Investment Partners, LLC, an affiliate of Carillon Tower Advisers, Inc., released the “Carillon Chartwell Mid Cap Value Fund” third quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In the third quarter market leadership shifted abruptly. Small and mid-caps outpaced large caps, while value outperformed growth.
